t:type.name: EasCode
t:type.t:description: Represents a mapping between a stateCode and its full name as defined by the NWS.

t:attribute.name: eas
t:attribute.description: The 3 character event code for NWR-SAME-CODE mappings

t:attribute.name: name
t:attribute.description: The full name represented by the EAS event code
